data.title: La Ferme, Rodrigues Island, MU Climate Zone, Monthly Averages, Historical Weather Data
data.meta_description: Located at an elevation of 111.6 meters (366.14 feet) above sea level, La Ferme has a Tropical monsoon climate (Classification: Am).
data.text:
La Ferme Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 111.6 meters (366.14 feet) above sea level, La Ferme has a Tropical monsoon climate (Classification: Am). The district’s yearly temperature is 25.58ºC (78.04ºF) and it is 0.49% higher than Mauritius’s averages. La Ferme typically receives about 95.81 millimeters (3.77 inches) of precipitation and has 178.48 rainy days (48.9% of the time) annually.
